title: Any suggestions for 60's Soul label fonts?
content:
I have to create some imagery for a Stax/Motown/general 60’s soul-type covers band and wanted some help with suggestions for fonts in this field. I know that the font used for the Stax logo was identified not so long ago, but can’t find that thread, sorry.

JH

 [‹ Script Typeface Classification](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46843 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alternatives to Skopex ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46842 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jazzhustler

comments.content:
Cabernet Swash would work nicely.

- Lex

Steile Futura (Stax), Knockout compressed, Heroic Condensed, etc.

dr
